response:
"Wovon wir nicht sprechen, können wir nicht verstehen. Über die Verarbeitung unserer persönlichen Daten sollten wir uns Gedanken machen. #Datenschutz #Privatsphäre #Datenkraken"

Translation: "What we don't talk about, we can't understand. We should think about how our personal data is being processed. #DataPrivacy #PrivateSphere #DataMonsters"

This post highlights the importance of discussing and understanding the processing of personal data in order to protect privacy and data security. The hashtags #Datenschutz (data privacy), #Privatsphäre (private sphere), and #Datenkraken (data monsters) are used to reach a wider audience and draw attention to the topic.
